body_html:
@apaszke is it ok to now assume that the input tensor is always batched. For example in VolumetricDilatedConvolution.c it has the dimf variable to see which index in the input tensor should match the nInputPlanes (0 if non-batched input).

As the cudnn Convolution is pretty generic, I can't see how we can tell if an input is batched or not, but if we can assume batched adding the dim checks is quite easy.

As the cudnn Convolution is pretty generic, I can't see how we can tell if an input is batched or not, but if we can assume batched adding the dim checks is quite easy.
body:
@apaszke is it ok to now assume that the input tensor is always batched. For example in `VolumetricDilatedConvolution.c` it has the `dimf` variable to see which index in the input tensor should  match the `nInputPlanes` (0 if non-batched input). 

As the cudnn Convolution is pretty generic, I can't see how we can tell if an input is batched or not, but if we can assume batched adding the dim checks is quite easy.
